hooks.name: Validate Three.js Patterns
hooks.description: Checks Three.js components for proper cleanup and best practices

action.message: Check the saved file for Three.js best practices: proper cleanup (dispose), resource management, and React patterns. Only report issues if found.

hooks.name: Suggest API Reference
hooks.description: Suggests relevant API documentation when working with Three.js files

action.message: Based on the current file, suggest which API reference file from .kiro/reference/threejs-api/ would be most helpful. Use QUICK-REFERENCE.md to determine the right file.

hooks.name: Optimize Three.js Scene
hooks.description: Reviews current scene for performance optimizations

action.message: Review the current Three.js scene for performance optimizations. Check: geometry/material reuse, InstancedMesh usage, proper disposal, lighting count, texture sizes, and polygon counts. Reference best-practices.md.

hooks.name: Generate Three.js Example
hooks.description: Creates a new example component in src/examples/

action.message: Help me create a new Three.js example. Ask what I want to demonstrate, then create a component in src/examples/ following the template patterns from threejs-expert.md.

hooks.name: Debug Three.js Scene
hooks.description: Adds debug helpers to visualize the scene

action.message: Add debug helpers to the current scene: AxesHelper, GridHelper, and any relevant helpers for lights or cameras. Reference llms-helpers.txt for available helpers.

hooks.name: Check Three.js Version
hooks.description: Checks if Three.js and related dependencies are up to date
